title: Better Sensemaking, with Daniel Schmachtenberger, John Vervaeke & Sara Ness
description:
A short film bringing together thoughts on sensemaking from three of our favourite people. 

Daniel Schmachtenberger talks about where to start with improving your ability to understand and act in the world. John Vervaeke makes an impassioned plea for a cultural revolution and Sara Ness talks about the practical steps you can take to improve your conversational skills.

This film is released ahead of our Sensemaking 101 course that begins next week, if you want to develop your skills and go on a journey of learning and exploration, we'd love you to join us: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/courses/sensemaking-101-page
